name: part_007
file: tmp_≪-KAGURA- Dance of the Gods 3D LIVE≫ Hakos Baelz Birthday 2025 + ANNOUNCEMENTS! #BaeDDay2025 [viPlIHvk724]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: MC section featuring Anya Melfissa wishing Hakos Baelz a happy birthday.
Hakos Baelz solo MC section, transitioning between Japanese and English.
Stage transition and preparation for the next song.
Performance of the song 'Asa ga Kuru'.

subtitles.original: Please just overlook that anyway.
subtitles.english: Please just overlook that anyway.

subtitles.original: ありがとね！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: ありがとね。
subtitles.english: Thank you.

subtitles.original: ベぇちゃんとして、ま今日じゃないけど、お誕生日おめでとう！
subtitles.english: As Bae, well it's not today, but Happy Birthday!

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Thank you very much!

subtitles.original: 素敵な１年を過ごしてね。
subtitles.english: Have a wonderful year.

subtitles.original: うふふ。ななななになに？
subtitles.english: Hehehe. Wha-wha-what?

subtitles.original: まということで、ライブも後半行ってるので、
subtitles.english: So, we're heading into the second half of the live,

subtitles.original: これからもまだまだね曲があるので、ぜひぜひ聴いてください。
subtitles.english: there are still more songs coming up, so please do listen to them.

subtitles.original: We are still, we're in like the uh later part of the live
subtitles.english: We are still, we're in like the uh later part of the live

subtitles.original: so we still got a lot of songs for you guys to listen to so please um...
subtitles.english: so we still got a lot of songs for you guys to listen to so please um...

subtitles.original: I said we, there's no one else here. Hehe.
subtitles.english: I said we, there's no one else here. Hehe.

subtitles.original: This is me and stuff but I've got a lot of other songs for you to listen to
subtitles.english: This is me and stuff but I've got a lot of other songs for you to listen to

subtitles.original: so please continue listening, thank you.
subtitles.english: so please continue listening, thank you.

subtitles.original: There's the next song.
subtitles.english: There's the next song.

subtitles.original: Okay, let's go. Alright, I'm gonna get ready. Okay.
subtitles.english: Okay, let's go. Alright, I'm gonna get ready. Okay.

subtitles.original:
朝が来る
Lyrics, Music: 梶浦由記
subtitles.english:
Morning is Coming
Lyrics, Music: Yuki Kajiura

subtitles.original: 傷だらけの世界の端に
subtitles.english: On the edge of this world full of wounds,

subtitles.original: 闇が重たくもたれかかる
subtitles.english: Darkness leans heavily,

subtitles.original: 覚めない時の中
subtitles.english: In the time that doesn't wake up,

subtitles.original: 悲しみはどこまでも追いすがって
subtitles.english: Sadness chases everywhere,

subtitles.original: それでも空は夜明けを探して
subtitles.english: Even so, the sky searches for the dawn,

subtitles.original: 取りに行く未来
subtitles.english: The future we go to take...

subtitles.original: 僕らは弱くも儚くもないよ
subtitles.english: We are neither weak nor fleeting,

subtitles.original: 信じて愛して
subtitles.english: Believe, love,

subtitles.original: 燃え尽きていく
subtitles.english: and burn out...

subtitles.original: 繰り返し繰り返し 血を流す魂が
subtitles.english: Again and again, the soul that sheds blood,

subtitles.original: 夢を見るその先に
subtitles.english: Beyond that dream...

subtitles.original: 輝いて輝いて 新しい朝が来る
subtitles.english: Shining, shining, a new morning comes,

subtitles.original: 希望を掲げ
subtitles.english: Holding hope high...

subtitles.original: 君を呼んでいる黎明
subtitles.english: The dawn is calling you...

subtitles.original: 失うことで落ちていくか
subtitles.english: Will we fall by losing,

subtitles.original: それとも光を追いかけるか
subtitles.english: or will we chase the light?

subtitles.original: 選んできた道に散らした
subtitles.english: Scattered on the path we chose,

subtitles.original: 涙も傷も遠くなって
subtitles.english: tears and wounds are far away,

subtitles.original: 息を殺し強欲の影見上げれ
subtitles.english: Hold your breath and look up at the shadow of greed,

subtitles.original: それでも鮮やかに風を切って
subtitles.english: Even so, cutting through the wind vividly,

subtitles.original: 手に入れる未来
subtitles.english: the future we obtain...

subtitles.original: 情熱がいつだって灯火になるよ
subtitles.english: Passion will always be a lamp,

subtitles.original: 天高く昇れと
subtitles.english: Climb high into the sky,

subtitles.original: 狼煙を上げて
subtitles.english: and raise a signal fire,

subtitles.original: 風になり花開き 魂を掻き鳴らす
subtitles.english: Becoming the wind, flowers blooming, playing the soul,

subtitles.original: 僕らが急ぐ場所へ
subtitles.english: to the place where we hurry...

subtitles.original: 華やいで華やいで 新しい朝が来る
subtitles.english: Brilliant, brilliant, a new morning comes,

subtitles.original: 光が
subtitles.english: The light,

subtitles.original: たなびく方へ
subtitles.english: towards where it drifts...

subtitles.original: 夜のもう一つ向こうまで
subtitles.english: To one more beyond the night,

subtitles.original: どうしても届かない
subtitles.english: No matter what, it doesn't reach...

subtitles.original: 手のひらを支えてくれ
subtitles.english: Support my palm,

subtitles.original: 声がいつの間にかこんなに響いてた
subtitles.english: Before I knew it, my voice was echoing like this...

subtitles.original: 君の行く場所に光あれと祈った
subtitles.english: I prayed for light to be in the place where you go,

subtitles.original: 全ての心のため
subtitles.english: For all hearts,

subtitles.original: 繰り返し繰り返し 血を流す魂が
subtitles.english: Again and again, the soul that sheds blood,

subtitles.original: 夢を見るその先に
subtitles.english: Beyond that dream...

subtitles.original: 輝いて輝いて 新しい朝が来る
subtitles.english: Shining, shining, a new morning comes,

subtitles.original: もうすぐ
subtitles.english: Very soon...

subtitles.original: 始まる
subtitles.english: It begins...
